description: Embark on your favorite trails with confidence in this sleeveless Sherpa vest. Crafted from Bluesign-certified Polartec® Shearling Fleece Thermal Pro® fabric, it provides exceptional warmth while effectively wicking away moisture. Stay dry and comfortable during even the most intense outdoor activities. Its casual aesthetic and versatile design make it perfect as a mid-layer under a shell or as a stylish everyday garment. Whether hiking in the mountains or camping under the stars, this Sherpa vest will be your reliable companion on every adventure.
name: Cordero Full-Zip Sleeveless Vest - Womens
